text: I have set up this exact slide, as a drop-panel from my ceiling, and the next time someone so much as mentions ABBA, raccoons, or fellatio, BAM.

name: invidious
text: holy daikon root batman

name: slodowy_slicer
text: The beauty of it is you can be the one to bring it up. In principle, Ray might not even think that Beef as seen through a kaleidoscope looks like an Isosceles Lock - he just has to make a metaphor - any metaphor - which refers to it, and then wait for Beef's dismissive query. Even if Beef thinks that it's implausible that he appears as Ray suggests, the implausibility is trumped by that of the mythical "fellatiouroboros".

name: professorhazard
text: He also has a diagram of the human reproductive system and a map of Middle Earth.

name: cbtbone
text: Don't forget the diagram showing how a small fighter could penetrate the Death Star's defenses.

name: mremaknu
text: Isn't it a diagram of an enlarged prostate?

name: wolfensti
text: Enlarged AND infected.

name: clever-nickname
text: it's even got a trademark, complete with the last names of the dudes from ABBA

name: history
text: Speaking from 2009, there has recently been an entire series of beer commercials that ripped this idea off.  With the guy drawing pictures and charts out of no where.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: I am a projectionist wasting my time at work on Achewood forums, and the film I'm projecting tonight, Shortbus, actually features the isosceles lock.  Was John Cameron-Mitchell inspired by Achewood?  No doubt.

name: nutmeg
text: SHORTBUS! you work at a hip cinema sir. wish we had one of those where i live. been tryin' to see that movie fo' eva.

name: terebikun
text: Weird, I just watched it tonight.  It was only alright.

name: nutmeg
text: yeah, finally caught up with it, and yeah.

name: terebikun
text: Really more notable for an actor performing auto-fellatio outside of an Andy Warhol movie than anything else.

name: awko
text: Amongst my friends the Star Spangled Banner scene was more of a talking point.

name: boredom_man
text: In all sincerity, I found it deeply moving, especially the scenes with the voyeur and the dominatrix.

name: epicurus
text:
I have gotten a lot of sideways looks trying to explain to people how I know the name for this technique. The wierd thing is, the triangle is hypothetically equilateral, not isoceles, right? Even the one in Ray's slide.

Also, I still can't figure out how exactly that works.

name: deimosrising
text: The odds of finding three men who are exactly the same height are extremely slim. In reality the triangle is almost certain to be scalene.

name: gouldgonewild
text: and besides, an equilateral triangle is isoceles.  AT LEAST two equal sides. Oh my god, why are we talking about this?

name: connellingus
text: I think the assumption is that the two dudes from ABBA are of the same height. According to IMDb, they differ by half an inch, so for all intents and purposes, they form an isosceles triangle with a third dude of any height.

name: peterjoel
text:
Their respective heights are not important. To form a true isosceles lock, 2 of the 3 participants should measure the same distance from the lower lip to the base of the penis.

If all 3 partipants sport the same distance from lip to penis, it is known as an equilateral lock . This is relatively rare but apparently less enjoyable than the isosceles the lock. I guess it's a power thing.

A scalene lock is apparently very disappointing and not worth attempting - even if you are really into the idea of experimenting with gay orgy sex positions.

name: catgrl131
text: Also, Roast Beef is a cat.

name: molesticide
text: the usage of the word isoceles does not refer to distance or measurement, but rather to the fact that two of the sides in this triangle are the dudes from ABBA, while the third side is roast beef.  thus, two equal (or at least related) sides, and a third interloper.

name: qatipay
text: the copyright on the slide really makes it work.

name: talix18
text: Thank you for seeing that.

text: "You try to steal my ideas for how to suck a man's dick I will sic the patent office on yo ass."

text: From someone with a childhood pet giraffe named Isosceles and who lived on Via Lock?

name: woodenteeth
text: There is something extremely rad about a pet giraffe named Isosceles. I know this is not an accurate name for it's dimensions.

name: varnish
text:
Ray has the slide show ready, just in case.

You have to be ready to explain such things, at all times. Ray knows this.

text: Agnetha I will not be at home again this Evening

name: dasilodavi
text: I told some friends about the Isosceles Lock.  Some were concerned, some were kind of excited.

name: ford
text: When utilizing more than three participants for an Isosceles Lock, The resultant polygonal formation is typically referred to as a Daisy Chain.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Oh, okay, that's it.  I was wondering if Daisy Chain was the term when chicks do it or what.  Thanks for clearing that up.

name: deancain29
text: Flut!

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Still, I don't think three dudes can 69. Perhaps they can 'sigma over 69'.

This would make sense because performing the Isosceles Lock is a standard deviation for Swedish pop bands.

name: molesticide
text:
three dudes can 69. the penis enters the mouth upside down, the head goes between the legs. it is a slight stretch for the skin on top of the penis, to be pulled to such an angle, but not so uncomfortable it cannot be enjoyed.

i have never done this, i just have a very good imagination.

name: blindspot
text: It's no longer truly a 69.  The closest way to represent the Isosceles Lock numerically is 683.

text: What's the other 5 percent?

text: Fuck I love this strip, I bet this strip is followed by a 3 hour lecture on how 3 dudes do the 69, and perhaps even a video demonstrating it.

name: carten
text: ... visions of Beef sitting down to watch a home movie warning him of the dangers of performing this maneuver, a la "Johnny Dangerously" scene.

name: changuitotuerto
text: I have drawn out similar diagrams in order to plan massive theoretical orgies. My compliments to the dudes from ABBA for paving the way.

name: riazm
text:
I'd love to see the genesis of this strip. How did it come together? 69ing with the dudes from Abba leads naturally to the slideshow, but I mean.

The kaleidoscope combined with a coonskin cap? What? How did those two elements combine?

name: circadin
text: Merely mentioning the Isosceles Lock causes the screen to fall and the projector to start up.

name: unsentletter
text: For my part, I am glad that the scene cut away at that point.

name: sp1derbaby
text: In mid-January 1979, Ulvaeus and Fältskog announced they were getting divorced.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Fuck! Now I know why.

name: lawbot
text: I would rate this strip over 5 were that possible. It is at least a 2.9 on the scale of scale disruption.

name: canusdivinus
text: That's... kind of cool, Ray. Why did you think of that though. Why would you think of that.

name: colorlessness
text: I keep thinking the circles represent their gonads.  As this is the most important part of a man involved in the Isosceles Lock.

name: chachibenji
text: They make such good music and man-triangles.

name: jhunter
text: I like to imagine that Ray has secreted slideshows in many different places in his house, each pertaining to ever more elaborate and irrelevant phenomena

name: mnemon
text: Revolutionized what exactly?  I think the genius is in the fact that it is up to us, the reader, to decide the content and direction of said revolution...
